[Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Then sound the whistle [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]by pressing [System:Color name="Default"][PictureFont:IconData key="Whistle" scale="0.66"/].
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_RemindJoinPikmin_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="271a0e50ec3144dc9c0b89023c69fb44" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I better call the Pikmin back.

WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_AddPikmin_75_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b118317c4da14231a2c7b892d441cc22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I have plenty of Pikmin now...

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="59afa80afc22434ab1027f95a10dd5bd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]What a relief! I've found all my Pikmin!
[Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Now I just need to [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]find my missing parts[System:Color name="Default"]!
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_SearchSmellDemoAfter_0: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="a71c83d95bc9456c9e92d0cde1d8b61a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Using [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] helps keep track of the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]scent[System:Color name="Default"].
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="10bae032a68b4b7b80771a2ba420c659" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I can't lose the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]scent [System:Color name="Default"]now!
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_FindCrackPot_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="eff140a6d3da44bf9b483ac583b711cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]One good [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rush[System:Color name="Default"] could break those!
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_FindCrackPot_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="12d5964c5f934ccca787f2c15ac6fd92" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You can't hide from me...

[Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Let's [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rush [System:Color name="Default"]with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/] and check it out.

I'll use [PictureFont:IconData key="Vertical_R_Stick" scale="0.66"/] to take a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]peek[System:Color name="Default"].
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="16d0ea09e16b47b7a7059ef42afd5029" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Something up there's making a racket...

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0f61440a42754c358fadfd2312540c4c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SurpriseFaceNormal"/]Huh?! Let's get them down with a [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Rush[System:Color name="Default"].

WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_TossinBookend_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ed5231361c46482a94a29f44a7cd3b29" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Do I want to know what's up here...
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_FindHari:

WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_FindHari_FewPikmin: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6e8abf4152ba4f6fad37dfa6350ea508" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Obie"/]I wish I had more Pikmin with me...
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_BattleHari_BeforeTossi: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="bd53e7d0806d466887f17dba0e8184c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]Keep running while charging up with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]!

[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d7f73dc877e944a091ed62c3ca250cea" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]At the right time, let's Rush it with [PictureFont:IconData key="Variable_X_Button" scale="0.66"/][PictureFont:IconData key="Long_Press_Button" scale="0.66"/]!
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_BattleHari_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1207cfbca8c14a06a860c642380289a6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/]I've got to get that [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]part [System:Color name="Default"]back!
WavePrologue.Prologue_Announce_BattleHari_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="74ec49e06aad4381bb50240ead2aa6fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm not a fan of those spikes.

[Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Maybe I should find a few more Pikmin.
